ps3.3:2.1.pli: Hañci cittena abhisameti, tena hi aññāṇī abhisameti?

ps3.3:3.1.pli: Hañci ñāṇena abhisameti, tena hi acittena ca ñāṇena ca acittako abhisameti?

ps3.3:4.1.pli: Hañci cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti, tena hi kāmāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:4.2.pli: Na kāmāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:5.1.pli: Tena hi rūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:5.2.pli: Na rūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:6.1.pli: Tena hi arūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:6.2.pli: Na arūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:7.1.pli: Tena hi kammassakatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:7.2.pli: Na kammassakatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:8.1.pli: Tena hi saccānulomikacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:8.2.pli: Na saccānulomikacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:9.1.pli: Tena hi atītacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:9.2.pli: Na atītacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:10.1.pli: Tena hi anāgatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:10.2.pli: Na anāgatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:11.1.pli: Tena hi paccuppannalokiyacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:11.2.pli: Na paccuppannalokiyacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:11.3.pli: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:12.1.pli: Kathaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?

ps3.3:12.2.pli: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppādādhipateyyaṃ cittaṃ ñāṇassa hetu paccayo ca taṃsampayuttaṃ nirodhagocaraṃ dassanādhipateyyaṃ ñāṇaṃ cittassa hetu paccayo ca taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ nirodhagocaraṃ.

ps3.3:12.3.pli: Evaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.

ps3.3:13.3.pli: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe dassanābhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi, abhiniropanābhisamayo sammāsaṅkappo, pariggahābhisamayo sammāvācā, samuṭṭhānābhisamayo sammākammanto, vodānābhisamayo sammāājīvo, paggahābhisamayo sammāvāyāmo, upaṭṭhānābhisamayo sammāsati, avikkhepābhisamayo sammāsamādhi;

ps3.3:13.4.pli: upaṭṭhānābhisamayo satisambojjhaṅgo, pavicayābhisamayo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, paggahābhisamayo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pharaṇābhisamayo pītisambojjhaṅgo, upasamābhisamayo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, avikkhepābhisamayo samādhisambojjhaṅgo, paṭisaṅkhānābhisamayo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo;

ps3.3:13.5.pli: assaddhiye akampiyābhisamayo saddhābalaṃ, kosajje akampiyābhisamayo vīriyabalaṃ, pamāde akampiyābhisamayo satibalaṃ, uddhacce akampiyābhisamayo samādhibalaṃ, avijjāya akampiyābhisamayo paññābalaṃ;

ps3.3:13.6.pli: adhimokkhābhisamayo saddhindriyaṃ, paggahābhisamayo vīriyindriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānābhisamayo satindriyaṃ, avikkhepābhisamayo samādhindriyaṃ, dassanābhisamayo paññindriyaṃ.

ps3.3:13.7.pli: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyābhisamayo, akampiyaṭṭhena balābhisamayo, niyyānaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgābhisamayo, hetuṭṭhena maggābhisamayo, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānābhisamayo, padahaṭṭhena sammappadhānābhisamayo, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādābhisamayo, tathaṭṭhena saccābhisamayo, avikkhepaṭṭhena samathābhisamayo, anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanābhisamayo, ekarasaṭṭhena samathavipassanābhisamayo, anativattanaṭṭhena yuganaddhābhisamayo, saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhiabhisamayo, avikkhepaṭṭhena visuddhiabhisamayo, dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhiabhisamayo, muttaṭṭhena vimokkhābhisamayo, paṭivedhaṭṭhena vijjābhisamayo, pariccāgaṭṭhena vimuttiabhisamayo, samucchedaṭṭhena khaye ñāṇaṃ abhisamayo.

ps3.3:13.8.pli: Chando mūlaṭṭhena abhisamayo, manasikāro samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena abhisamayo, phasso samodhānaṭṭhena abhisamayo, vedanā samosaraṇaṭṭhena abhisamayo, samādhi pamukhaṭṭhena abhisamayo, sati ādhipateyyaṭṭhena abhisamayo, paññā taduttaraṭṭhena abhisamayo, vimutti sāraṭṭhena abhisamayo, amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṭṭhena abhisamayo.

ps3.3:17.1.pli: Yvāyaṃ kilese pajahati, atīte kilese pajahati …pe…

ps3.3:17.2.pli: anāgate kilese pajahati, paccuppanne kilese pajahati, atīte kilese pajahatīti.

ps3.3:17.3.pli: Hañci atīte kilese pajahati, tena hi khīṇaṃ khepeti, niruddhaṃ nirodheti, vigataṃ vigameti, atthaṅgataṃ atthaṅgameti, atītaṃ yaṃ na atthi taṃ pajahatīti?

ps3.3:17.6.pli: Hañci anāgate kilese pajahati, tena hi ajātaṃ pajahati, anibbattaṃ pajahati, anuppannaṃ pajahati, apātubhūtaṃ pajahati, anāgataṃ yaṃ na atthi taṃ pajahatīti?

ps3.3:17.9.pli: Hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi ratto rāgaṃ pajahati, duṭṭho dosaṃ pajahati, mūḷho mohaṃ pajahati, vinibaddho mānaṃ pajahati, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhiṃ pajahati, vikkhepagato uddhaccaṃ pajahati, aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchaṃ pajahati, thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahati, kaṇhasukkadhammā yuganaddhā samameva vattanti, saṅkilesikā maggabhāvanā hoti?

ps3.3:18.1.pli: Na hi atīte kilese pajahati, na anāgate kilese pajahati, na paccuppanne kilese pajahatīti.

ps3.3:18.2.pli: Hañci na atīte kilese pajahati, na anāgate …pe…

ps3.3:18.3.pli: na paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi natthi maggabhāvanā, natthi phalasacchikiriyā, natthi kilesappahānaṃ, natthi dhammābhisamayoti?

ps3.3:18.4.pli: Atthi maggabhāvanā, atthi phalasacchikiriyā, atthi kilesappahānaṃ, atthi dhammābhisamayo.

ps3.3:18.8.pli: Ye tassa rukkhassa ajātaphalā, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti, anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti, apātubhūtāyeva na pātubhavanti.

ps3.3:18.9.pli: Evamevaṃ uppādo hetu, uppādo paccayo kilesānaṃ nibbattiyāti.

ps3.3:18.10.pli: Uppāde ādīnavaṃ disvā anuppāde cittaṃ pakkhandati.

ps3.3:18.11.pli: Anuppāde cittassa pakkhandattā ye uppādapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṃ, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti, anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti, apātubhūtāyeva na pātubhavanti.

ps3.3:18.13.pli: Pavattaṃ hetu, nimittaṃ hetu, āyūhanā hetu.

ps3.3:18.15.pli: Āyūhane ādīnavaṃ disvā anāyūhane cittaṃ pakkhandati.

ps3.3:18.16.pli: Anāyūhane cittassa pakkhandattā, ye āyūhanapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṃ, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti, anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti, apātubhūtāyeva na pātubhavanti.

ps3.3:18.18.pli: Evaṃ atthi maggabhāvanā, atthi phalasacchikiriyā, atthi kilesappahānaṃ, atthi dhammābhisamayoti.

ps3.4:1.2.pli: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti, sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya evamete balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti;

ps3.4:1.3.pli: evamevaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaroti.

ps3.4:2.1.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaroti?

ps3.4:2.2.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiṃ.

ps3.4:2.9.pli: sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiṃ.

ps3.4:2.10.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaroti.

ps3.4:3.1.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti, sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti;

ps3.4:3.2.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu.

ps3.4:4.1.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu?

ps3.4:4.2.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiṃ.

ps3.4:4.9.pli: sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiṃ.

ps3.4:4.10.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesū”ti.

ps3.4:5.1.pli: Sammādiṭṭhiyā pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:5.8.pli: sammāsamādhissa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:6.3.pli: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:6.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu vivekesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:7.3.pli: Vikkhambhanavirāgo ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavirāgo ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedavirāgo ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivirāgo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavirāgo ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:7.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu virāgesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:8.3.pli: Vikkhambhananirodho ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅganirodho ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedanirodho ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhinirodho ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇanirodho ca amatā dhātu.

ps3.4:8.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu nirodhesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:9.3.pli: Vikkhambhanavosaggo ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavosaggo ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedavosaggo ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivosaggo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavosaggo ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:9.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu vosaggesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:9.6.pli: Sammādiṭṭhiyā ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:10.9.pli: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:10.11.pli: Imesu pañcasu vivekesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:11.3.pli: Vikkhambhanavirāgo ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavirāgo ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedavirāgo ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivirāgo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavirāgo ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:11.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu virāgesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:12.3.pli: Vikkhambhananirodho ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅganirodho ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedanirodho ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhinirodho ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇanirodho ca amatā dhātu.

ps3.4:12.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu nirodhesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:13.3.pli: Vikkhambhanavosaggo ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavosaggo ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedavosaggo ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivosaggo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavosaggo ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:13.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu vosaggesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.

ps3.4:13.6.pli: Sammāsamādhissa ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:14.1.pli: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti, sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya evamete balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti;

ps3.4:14.2.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāveti, satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaroti …pe…

ps3.4:14.3.pli: satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu …pe…

ps3.4:14.4.pli: pañca balāni bhāveti, pañca balāni bahulīkaroti …pe…

ps3.4:14.5.pli: pañca balāni bhāvento pañca balāni bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu …pe…

ps3.4:15.1.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti, sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti;

ps3.4:15.2.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāvento pañcindriyāni bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu.

ps3.4:16.1.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāvento pañcindriyāni bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu?

ps3.4:16.2.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiṃ.

ps3.4:16.6.pli: paññindriyaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiṃ.

ps3.4:16.7.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya …pe…

ps3.4:17.1.pli: Saddhindriyassa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:17.5.pli: paññindriyassa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:18.3.pli: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps3.4:18.5.pli: Imesu pañcasu vivekesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṃ …pe…

ps3.4:18.6.pli: saddhindriyassa ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

ps3.4:19.6.pli: paññindriyassa ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayāti.

ps3.5:1.2.pli: iriyāpathacariyā, āyatanacariyā, saticariyā, samādhicariyā, ñāṇacariyā, maggacariyā, patticariyā, lokatthacariyāti.

ps3.5:2.8.pli: Lokatthacariyāti tathāgatesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu padese paccekabuddhesu padese sāvakesu.

ps3.5:3.8.pli: Lokatthacariyā ca tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ padese paccekabuddhānaṃ padese sāvakānaṃ.

ps3.5:4.2.pli: Adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena carati, upaṭṭhāpento satiyā carati, avikkhepaṃ karonto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya carati, vijānanto viññāṇacariyāya carati, evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti āyatanacariyāya carati, evaṃ paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti visesacariyāya carati.

ps3.5:5.2.pli: Dassanacariyā ca sammādiṭṭhiyā, abhiniropanacariyā ca sammāsaṅkappassa, pariggahacariyā ca sammāvācāya, samuṭṭhānacariyā ca sammākammantassa, vodānacariyā ca sammāājīvassa, paggahacariyā ca sammāvāyāmassa, upaṭṭhānacariyā ca sammāsatiyā, avikkhepacariyā ca sammāsamādhissa.

ps3.6:2.2.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—

ps3.6:2.3.pli: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;

ps3.6:3.3.pli: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.

ps3.6:3.4.pli: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.

ps3.6:3.5.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, api ca kho manussānaṃ vā amanussānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā ādisati—

ps3.6:3.6.pli: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.

ps3.6:3.7.pli: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.

ps3.6:3.8.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṃ vā amanussānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ sutvā ādisati—

ps3.6:3.9.pli: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.

ps3.6:3.10.pli: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.

ps3.6:3.11.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṃ vā amanussānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā ādisati, napi vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhiṃ samāpannassa cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti—

ps3.6:3.12.pli: ‘yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amukaṃ nāma vitakkaṃ vitakkayissatī’ti.

ps3.6:3.13.pli: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.

ps3.6:4.4.pli: Evaṃ manasi karotha, mā evaṃ manasākattha.

ps3.6:5.3.pli: Ye tena nekkhammena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:5.5.pli: “Taṃ kho pana nekkhammaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:6.3.pli: Ye tena abyāpādena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:6.5.pli: “So kho pana abyāpādo evaṃ āsevitabbo, evaṃ bhāvetabbo, evaṃ bahulīkātabbo, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:7.3.pli: Ye tāya ālokasaññāya samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:7.5.pli: “Sā kho pana ālokasaññā evaṃ āsevitabbā, evaṃ bhāvetabbā, evaṃ bahulīkātabbā, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:8.3.pli: Ye tena avikkhepena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:8.5.pli: “So kho pana avikkhepo evaṃ āsevitabbo, evaṃ bhāvetabbo, evaṃ bahulīkātabbo, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:9.3.pli: Ye tena dhammavavatthānena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:9.5.pli: “Taṃ kho pana dhammavavatthānaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā, sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:10.3.pli: Ye tena ñāṇena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:10.5.pli: “Taṃ kho pana ñāṇaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:11.3.pli: Ye tena pāmojjena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:11.5.pli: “Taṃ kho pana pāmojjaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:12.3.pli: Ye tena paṭhamena jhānena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:12.5.pli: “Taṃ kho pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:13.3.pli: Ye tena arahattamaggena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—

ps3.6:13.5.pli: “So kho pana arahattamaggo evaṃ āsevitabbo, evaṃ bhāvetabbo, evaṃ bahulīkātabbo, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—

ps3.6:14.3.pli: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṃ, idaṃ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ.

ps3.6:14.6.pli: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṃ, idaṃ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ.

ps3.6:14.11.pli: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṃ, idaṃ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyanti.

ps3.7:1.1.pli: Sabbadhammānaṃ sammāsamucchede nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatā paññā samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps3.7:2.1.pli: Sabbadhammānanti pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā, kāmāvacarā dhammā, rūpāvacarā dhammā, arūpāvacarā dhammā, apariyāpannā dhammā.

ps3.7:2.2.pli: Sammā samucchedeti nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ sammā samucchindati, abyāpādena byāpādaṃ sammā samucchindati, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṃ sammā samucchindati, avikkhepena uddhaccaṃ sammā samucchindati, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ sammā samucchindati, ñāṇena avijjaṃ sammā samucchindati, pāmojjena aratiṃ sammā samucchindati, paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇe sammā samucchindati …pe…

ps3.7:3.1.pli: Nirodheti nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ nirodheti, abyāpādena byāpādaṃ nirodheti, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṃ nirodheti, avikkhepena uddhaccaṃ nirodheti, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ nirodheti, ñāṇena avijjaṃ nirodheti, pāmojjena aratiṃ nirodheti, paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇe nirodheti …pe…

ps3.7:4.1.pli: Anupaṭṭhānatāti nekkhammaṃ paṭiladdhassa kāmacchando na upaṭṭhāti, abyāpādaṃ paṭiladdhassa byāpādo na upaṭṭhāti, ālokasaññaṃ paṭiladdhassa thinamiddhaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, avikkhepaṃ paṭiladdhassa uddhaccaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, dhammavavatthānaṃ paṭiladdhassa vicikicchā na upaṭṭhāti, ñāṇaṃ paṭiladdhassa avijjā na upaṭṭhāti, pāmojjaṃ paṭiladdhassa arati na upaṭṭhāti, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭiladdhassa nīvaraṇā na upaṭṭhanti …pe…

ps3.7:5.1.pli: Samanti kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhammaṃ samaṃ, byāpādassa pahīnattā abyāpādo samaṃ, thinamiddhassa pahīnattā ālokasaññā samaṃ, uddhaccassa pahīnattā avikkhepo samaṃ, vicikicchāya pahīnattā dhammavavatthānaṃ samaṃ, avijjāya pahīnattā ñāṇaṃ samaṃ, aratiyā pahīnattā pāmojjaṃ samaṃ, nīvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samaṃ …pe…

ps3.7:6.2.pli: palibodhasīsañca taṇhā, vinibandhanasīsañca māno, parāmāsasīsañca diṭṭhi, vikkhepasīsañca uddhaccaṃ, saṅkilesasīsañca avijjā, adhimokkhasīsañca saddhā, paggahasīsañca vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsañca sati, avikkhepasīsañca samādhi, dassanasīsañca paññā, pavattasīsañca jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsañca vimokkho, saṅkhārasīsañca nirodhoti.
